TopicTitle: Mechjeb question. How do I make it go away.

Articles.Content: I was an ion probe with an SSTO, and since I want to do something else while the ions burn, but Mechjeb keeps on being annoying and firing my Aerospikes,which is annoying. How to I make Mechjeb stop?
set up the aerospikes on your action groups and just turn them off
You might need to turn off auto-staging under ascent guidance.
Okay, But I do have action groups enabled. Just how silly do I look?
MechJeb doesn't activate engines last I checked, except through staging.
you should be able to set the engines you dont want to fire in a higher stage than your ion engines, then disable auto staging for mechjeb (you can change staging assignments in flight mode)

Just rightclick the engines and turn them off, and do whatever you want with it.

Or just don't use the autopilot? Ever tryd that?
